name: Peanut Butter Crunch Dirt Pudding Cups
ingredients: 1 cup of crushed chocolate sandwich cookies
instructions: 1. In a mixing bowl, combine the crushed chocolate sandwich cookies with the melted butter until well combined.
2. Spoon a layer of the cookie mixture into the bottom of each serving cup, pressing it down to create a firm crust.
3. In another mixing bowl, mix together the creamy peanut butter and powdered sugar until smooth and creamy.
4. Spoon a layer of the peanut butter mixture on top of the cookie crust in each serving cup.
5. Top each cup with a dollop of whipped topping.
6. Sprinkle mini chocolate chips on top for garnish.
7. Place the cups in the refrigerator for at least 1 hour to set and chill before serving.
description: Peanut Butter Crunch Dirt Pudding Cups are a delightful dessert that combines the rich flavors of creamy peanut butter, chocolate cookies, and fluffy whipped topping. This no-bake treat is perfect for any occasion and will satisfy your sweet tooth cravings.
